id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this event.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

eventDateTime.description: ISO8601 date and time. MUST contain time zone. UTC recommended.

location.description: Unique location scheme and identifier combination.

traitLabel.description: If the event represents a formal trait, identifies the recording system and trait.

responsible.description: Use if an observation is manually recorded, or an event is carried out or authorised by a person. SHOULD be a person object.

contemporaryGroup.description: For manually recorded events, record any contemporary group code that would affect statistical analysis.
